section.title: Building more advanced exercises
section.p: Some of the more interesting exercises ask learners to create content on their own. To show an example of the result, you can use HTML instead of a screen shot. The HTML needs to be in a <pre> element with an outputclass of passthru. Inside the <pre> element, set up a CDATA section to encapsulate the HTML.
The LearningDITA.com publishing pipeline is set up to pass through the contents of these special <pre> tags, so that the HTML is rendered by the WordPress/LearnDashLMS environment.
